divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting on my back porch when I looked up there was the same red gold multi colored object that we had witnessed a few weeks before. The difference between this sighting and the one in Feb 2013 was it was so much closer to our house and there was only 1 of them this time, I heard no sounds , It was not moving, More of a hover,I watched it a good 15 to 30 sec before going into the house for the video camera which took less then a minute however upon return it was nowhere in sight. The time was approx 9:30 pm
trends: There has been one other sighting in Cascade Locks
There were no other sightings in Cascade Locks on or around March 9th 2013
Summary: Hovering red orange ufo over the columbia
